hero.tagline: Software Engineer with a Business-Centered Mind
hero.description: 6+ years of experience crafting scalable applications and delivering measurable results. I help businesses reduce cognitive load by analyzing processes, identifying bottlenecks, and automating operations.

skills.heading: Technical Expertise
skills.description: Proficient in modern technologies and best practices across the full stack

process.heading: How I Work
process.description: A proven process that delivers results consistently

steps.title: Discovery & Research
steps.description: A simple meeting over a cup of coffee to assess if our partnership would be the right fit for your business needs.

steps.title: Strategy & Planning
steps.description: Completely hands-off for the customer while I dive deep into proposition research and create differently tiered offers tailored to your business.

steps.title: Development & Testing
steps.description: Mostly hands-off for the customer, with access to a protected testing environment so you can see progress and provide feedback throughout development.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.description: After final approvals, the launch is seamless. A simple monthly maintenance fee keeps your site/platform running smoothly, with additional features available through our proven process.

projects.heading: Featured Projects
projects.description: Real-world solutions delivering measurable business impact

items.title: Messy Play

items.title: Revora Ride
items.description: Custom built ecommerce platform for a physical goods store selling classic bicycles for kids with a vintage motorbike feel, featuring integrated analytics and marketing tools.

contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how I can help bring your vision to life and reduce your business's cognitive load.
